alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Lancaster; Lebanon; Northumberland; Schuylkill; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 1:14PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS AND AN ISOLATED THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT LANCASTER... SCHUYLKILL...EAST CENTRAL NORTHUMBERLAND...SOUTHEASTERN YORK...SOUTHEASTERN COLUMBIA AND LEBANON COUNTIES THROUGH 145 PM EDT... At 113 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a broken line of gusty showers along a line extending from Bloomsburg to near Mount Carmel to 12 miles northwest of Myerstown to Annville to Manheim to Dallastown to near Parkville. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Lebanon, Pottsville, Ephrata, Columbia, Lititz, Millersville, Willow Street, Mount Joy, Tamaqua, Red Lion, Mount Carmel, Schuylkill Haven, New Holland, Shenandoah, Spry, Manheim, Annville, East Petersburg and Minersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Lancaster; Lebanon; Northumberland; Schuylkill; York
